revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Kalos Power Plant |image = [[File:Kalos Power Plant.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Kalos Power Plant. |tokens = 575,000 |location = South of Route 13 }} '''Kalos Power Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 7,903,570 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == ===Rencontres sauvages===
